author: Badwolf_TW
description: Integrates OpenAI's API with your Discord server, allowing advanced AI interactions such as responding to messages, generating images, and supporting custom prompts.
end_user_data_statement: This cog securely stores API keys and configuration. It may store short-term chat logs and extracted long-term memories (summary/facts) to improve responses. Users can opt out and delete their stored data, and guild admins can configure retention/limits.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the OpenAI Chat cog! Configure it by setting your API key using `[p]genai setkey`. Customize channels, prompts, and more with `[p]genai` commands.
name: OpenAIChat
